resources.string: Parking in chosen zone is FREE at this time of the day
Parking in chosen zone is FREE today
Do you really want to confirm this parking?
!!! ATTENTION !!! Free parking time is going to start at 18:00 (or 00:00 if you chose Orange zone). The real price may be lower than it is shown. Do you really want to keep chosen parking duration?
Do you really want to close the application?

Unfortunately, due to a late CONFIRM button action currently shown parking time may be incorrect, if you want to get the right parking time just cancel current confirmation and select parking time again.
Wrong licence plate number [use: XXXYYY (X - Letter, Y - Number)]
Do you really want to remove selected cars?
If SMS notifications is enabled, app push notifications turns off.
Do you really want to get the location of
What PARKLY app is used for?
How is the payment made for parking?
In which cities can I use this app?
How to select a default car?
How can I see the actual location of the street in the map gadget?
How can I remove license plates from the list?
How can I check free hours of specific parking zone?
How to adjust notifications of the upcoming end of the parking?
What is the format of automatically generated message?
PARKLY is used for easier parking payments. This app automatically generates text message and sends it to make parking confirmation.
Payment is made right after you press CONFIRM button. After that the message is generated automatically and sent via SMS to the number 1332, where the payment is paid from users mobile account.
At the moment you can only use it in Kaunas city.

There are two ways to select which car you want to use:

1. Open CARS tab, click and hold on the plate which you want to select and click MARK AS DEFAULT.

2. Open home tab and select your default car in dropdown menu.

In order to see the actual location of the street on the map, you will need to open section called PARKING ZONES, click and hold on the desired street name and choose the map application, which you want to use (you can choose only when you have multiple map applications).

There are two ways to remove license plates:

1. Open a tab called CARS, click and hold on the desired license plate and select REMOVE in the options menu.

2. Open a tab called CARS, click the REMOVE button and select the license plates that you want to remove.
All you have to do is just to open a tab named PARKING ZONES - there you can check week days and hours when parking is free.

You can adjust notifications in SETTINGS tab, there are 2 different switches, one (first switch) turns off all the notifications about the end of parking time, the second one is to turn off text messages or push notifications coming from the application. Text messages and application push notifications cannot be turned on both at the same time, if one is turned on the other one turns off.
